channel.title: Experienced Ruby Coder
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape, I am looking for an experienced ruby coder to teach me ruby. I've done CodeAcademy I've read a bunch of tutorials, I've read up on java I still do not really understand it and I know why. I can't read tutorials. If I don't understand something they can't just rephrase it for me I have to try to figure out what it means then I get all confused and I fuck up even more. So yeah if you're experienced or not even experienced just have a decent understanding of ruby please skype me: josh.cougan or reply in the comments.
Thanks, Kingclawz.

item.title: Experienced Ruby Coder
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:5, topic:545457”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=664338.msg4441299#msg4441299 date=1406723374]
What you want to know?
[/quote]

Um you know basic Ruby as Ashi has pointed out.[/quote]

Jmood this is the most annoying troll you’ve ever posted.

Read full topic
